content: Hello, I think it would be nice if global_asm could use the same sym/const features that inline asm!() does. https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/35119#issuecomment-769904257 If anyone is looking for something like that to look at :-)
I could offer a very tiny bounty, just to try get someone interested in it. It's just for hobby code, so not much of a bounty.
